p.codeblock: openstack project create monitoring ##mini-mon in *.yml file##

section.title: Creating the Required Roles
section.p: The following roles must be prepared:

p.codeblock: openstack role create monasca-user openstack role create monasca-agent

section.p: The user used for authenticating the agent against OpenStack Keystone must have the monasca-agent role assigned.
Access as a user with the monasca-user role must be provided to perform metrics monitoring tasks.
Access as a user with the monasca-user and admin role must be provided to perform lo g management tasks.

section.title: Creating the Agent User

p.codeblock: openstack user create --project monitoring --password password monitoring-agent

section.p: This user is used for authenticating an agent against Keystone. This user must be specified in the agent configuration. This user must have the monasca-agent role in OpenStack and be assigned to the OpenStack project that is to be monitored by the agent.
It is recommended that this user is used only for config purposes and not for actually monitoring services and servers.

section.title: Assigning Roles
section.p: The monitoring agent user and the admin user both require appropriate roles.

p.codeblock: openstack role add --project monitoring --user admin monasca-user openstack role add --project monitoring --user admin admin openstack role add --project monitoring --user monitoring-agent monasca-agent
